headline: Introducing TLS 1.3
keywords: TLS 1.3, TLS, HTTPS, RSA, Product News, Security, Chrome, Crypto Week
description: The encrypted Internet is about to become a whole lot snappier. When it comes to browsing, we’ve been driving around in a beat-up car from the 90s for a while. Little does anyone know, we’re all about to trade in our station wagons for a smoking new sports car.
